name: OWAMNIYOMNI OKHODAYAPI (FNA FRIENDS OF THE FALLS)
description: Non-profit to transform Upper Lock at the Falls into a community gathering place.
sampleDescriptions: Corrigan & Ussery will assist in conveyance of property at Lock and Dam 0 on the Mississippi River for public recreation.
